resources.string:
We are so happy you're here!

Better Chat Fast lets you talk with people from across the globe in thrilling, time-limited calls!

Make the most of your conversations by asking questions, exchanging social media accounts and getting to know each other (fast)!

Every hero needs a name, so pick one!
Just remember to not use anything offensive (we will see this)!

We also need to know your name and surname for security reasons.
Don't worry, your info will remain secure and hidden!
